king.name: king
king.desc: Candlestick King is the strong character of Candlestick, who succeeded in escaping from all enemies through her excessive intelligence and exaggeration.

mafia.name: mafia
mafia.desc: The candlestick mafia is a character trying to steal the candlestick, knowing its secret by following him and his assistants, and threatening the candlestick to find out the secret recipe

magician.name: magician
magician.desc: Candlestick Wizard is the character that makes the candlestick and he is the only one who knows the secret to cooking the magic recipe

hero.name: hero
hero.desc: The candlestick hero is a character who tries to steal the candlestick and find out its secret through his strength and violence resulting from playing the sport of boxing to know the secret recipe

joker.name: joker
joker.desc: The joker candlestick is a character trying to steal the candlestick and find out its secret through tricks to find out the secret recipe

diva.name: diva
diva.desc: Candlestick the diva is a character trying to steal and know the secret of the candlestick by seducing her and her followers who carry out her orders to find out the secret recipe
